data.name: Seattle GNU/Linux (aka SeaGL)
data.description: SeaGL is a grassroots technical conference dedicated to spreading awareness and knowledge about the GNU/Linux community and free/libre/open-source software/hardware.

data.description: Conferences covering a wide range of web development and software engineering topics.

relatedRecords.name: AllTheTalks
relatedRecords.description: A virtual fundraising tech conference on all things DevOps, Development & Security. Providing a safe online platform for talks cancelled due to the COVID-19 outbreak.

relatedRecords.name: IEEE Infrastructure Conference
relatedRecords.description: IEEE Infrastructure Conference - April 29-30, 2020 - San Francsico, CA USA - Highly relevant and future-looking technical keynotes and panels will anchor the event. The keynotes will stimulate the thinking and create the foundation for the day.

relatedRecords.name: Code BEAM SF
relatedRecords.description: Code BEAM SF is the only conference in the USA where we bring all the languages that run on the BEAM together. Discover how Erlang and Elixir are being used in industries and areas including IOT, Blockchain, Fintech, Security, Machine Learning and many more.
